field.label: Output Method
field.help: Select the output method you would like to use for exporting logs

field.label: Enabled
field.help: Toggle log inputs

field.label: Path(s)
field.help: Log paths - line-break delimited list of hosts to connect to. No spaces permitted, only line-breaks. Paths that should be crawled and fetched. Glob based paths.

field.label: Encoding
field.help: Configure the file encoding for reading files with international characters following the W3C recommendation for HTML5 (http://www.w3.org/TR/encoding).

field.label: Exclude Lines
field.help: A list of regular expressions to match. It drops the lines that are matching any regular expression from the list. The include_lines is called before exclude_lines. By default, no lines are dropped.

field.label: Include Lines
field.help: Include lines. A list of regular expressions to match. It exports the lines that are matching any regular expression from the list. The include_lines is called before exclude_lines. By default, all the lines are exported.

field.label: Exclude Files
field.help: A list of regular expressions to match. Filebeat drops the files that are matching any regular expression from the list. By default, no files are dropped.

field.label: Harvester Buffer Size
field.help: Defines the buffer size every harvester uses when fetching the file

field.label: Max Bytes
field.help: Maximum number of bytes a single log event can have. All bytes after max_bytes are discarded and not sent. The default is 10MB. This is especially useful for multiline log messages which can get large.

field.label: Host(s)
field.help: Logstash hosts - line-break delimited list of hosts to connect to. No spaces permitted, only line-breaks.

field.label: Workers
field.help: Number of workers per Logstash host.

field.label: Compression Level
field.help: Set gzip compression level.

field.label: TTL
field.help: Optional maximum time to live for a connection to Logstash, after which the connection will be re-established. A value of `0` (the default) will disable this feature. Not yet supported for async connections (i.e. with the "pipelining" option set)

field.label: Load Balance
field.help: Optional load balance the events between the Logstash hosts. Default is false.

field.label: Pipelining
field.help: Number of batches to be sent asynchronously to logstash while processing new batches.

field.label: Slow Start
field.help: If enabled only a subset of events in a batch of events is transferred per transaction. The number of events to be sent increases up to `bulk_max_size` if no error is encountered.

field.label: Index
field.help: Optional index name. The default index name is set to filebeat in all lowercase. Leave blank to disable

field.label: Enabled SSL
field.help: Enable SSL configuration

field.label: Certificate Authority
field.help: Root certificates for HTTPS server verification

field.label: Client Certificate
field.help: Certificate for SSL client authentication

field.label: Client Key
field.help: Client Certificate Key
